Name: Fly O'Clock
About the game: Fly Oâ€™Clock is tiny, highly-addictive single & online multiplayer arcade endless jumper with innovative one-touch mechanics and unique pixel-art graphics. The faster you play the more you risk and as you know: no risk no fun. Check how long you will survive on the clock face, avoid the clock hands and jump between 4 points as fast as you can to reach the top of the leaderboards. Unlock all the characters, watches and hats! Style your favorite insect with unique hat! - online multiplayer exclusively on Steam - 16+ characters to unlock - 5+ watches to jump on - 15+ hats to try on - ultimate Rock & Roll soundtrack! - one-touch controls - brand new jumpy gameplay
